Name: Play
Description: A play is a work written to be performed on stage. Musicals are considered plays for purposes of this type (that is, there is no separate type for musicals).  Plays are also typed as written works.

Properties.Name: Composer
Properties.Description: For musicals (and other plays with music), the person(s) who composed the music

Properties.Name: Date of First Performance
Properties.Description: The date this play was first performed.

Properties.Name: Lyricist
Properties.Description: For musicals (and other plays with songs), the person(s) who wrote the song lyrics.

Properties.Name: Orchestrator
Properties.Description: For musicals (and other plays with music), the person(s) who orchestrated the music.

Properties.Name: Playwright
Properties.Description: The person(s) who wrote the play, or, for musicals, who wrote the book.

Properties.Name: Soundtracks
Properties.Description: For musicals (and other plays with music), any recordings (live or studio) that have been released of this play's music. Cast recordings may also be entered in the "soundtracks" property of the Theater Production topic. Do not include soundtracks from film or TV adaptations of the play.
